Room.Name: Waterfront Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Waterfront Way, north of the Golden Dolphin Inn.
Room.LongDescription: The entrance to the Golden Dolphin Inn is to the south from here. There is a small saloon on the southwestern corner of this block that appears to be fairly relaxed and easy-going. To the north is Waterfront Plaza, where you can have weapons repaired and buy all sorts of interesting items from friendly merchants.
